sentences: Tema meelest vajub pruugiloo ettevõtja alati naisi oma tootmiseks.
Eestis peavad pruugitavad inimesed neid otsima isikulise pruugi kaudu.
context: Pruugi refers to the act of searching for a spouse or bride, often in the context of traditional practices. It can also refer directly to a spouse or a bride in certain contexts.
